plot: All of Cinderella's friends and family are concerned that she is a sex addict, and they host an Intervention to try to 'save' her.
title: Intervention: Cinderella
plot_es: All of Cinderella's friends and family are concerned that she is a sex addict, and they host an Intervention to try to 'save' her.
plot_en: All of Cinderella's friends and family are concerned that she is a sex addict, and they host an Intervention to try to 'save' her.
